message:
So my fiance and I are getting married in a few months. We thought about having a garage sale to raise money but figured no one wanted some old running shoes or a rusty toaster. Instead we collaborated with some of our friends and put together a digital media deals website. This is just the MVP but we hope it helps us get enough money for our wedding. If that works out we have big plans for the next release.

I would really appreciate any feedback you guys could give us. :-) https://www.crowdbundle.com/
Looks pretty good. I hope it works out for you. I just got married and I can totally understand the headache about money :)
Thanks! I am using snap engage but people are actually cussing me out on there. Anyone else have similar experiences with live chat?
@ToddWilliams I operate the live chat for my company now, but I've never had anyone cuss me out.
@CrowderSoup Haha, just had a small wave of trolls I guess
Which payment gateway are you using? BTW good stuff, good luck :)
Just posted an article summarizing things we have implemented to promote our project learned on HN
